page.title: 08THE STABLE.
page.content: As I go round the farm I have many {different smells}.But there is one smell which brings back{a memory}.It is in{the Stable}.When I go in I see little bits of straw lying on the floor.As I walk up to the corner there is a manger.I would sit down on a potato box.I would cast back my memory to the time when it was{coming near {Christmas}and our family was going to my granny's.As we passed Granahan Chapel we decided to go in to see the Crib.As we walked up the aisle we took a seat and prayed to God for twenty minutes.Then we went up to{the Crib and saw the{cow, lamb and donkey.}We saw{Mary and Joseph}kneeling round the manger where the{baby Jesus lies}.Then the{three wise Kings,}kneeling around the crib holding{Myrh, Gold and {Frankincense}.Now I look back and thank God for Christmas.
